MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA24 postcode area of Dalry. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 08.16am. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to further investigation required on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:59am on Sunday, 14 March 2021.
